column4: is it possible to triple-boot Ubuntu with Win and OS X on a Macbook?
tripple booting, dual booting, quadruple booting.. it's all the same.. I don't know how OS X works though..doesn't it use that other bios?
I think Leopard comes with BootCamp, which allows for dual booting with Windows. :)
yup.. that sounds familiar.. does it play nice with grub? or it replaces grub?
